alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Brule; Jerauld (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 08 at 2:09AM MST until November 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Beadle, Jerauld and Brule Counties. * WHEN...A wintry mix of freezing rain, sleet and snow could develop late Wednesday night into Thursday morning, with snow and blowing snow becoming more likely Thursday afternoon into Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Projected snow and ice accumulations are still very uncertain, and are likely to change. Focus on the potential impacts of this early season winter storm, and not on specific amounts.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
